com.seanchenxi.gwt.storage.shared

Class StorageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seanchenxi.gwt.storage.shared.StorageUtils

  • public class StorageUtils
extends Object
    A utility class for easy serialization/deserialization actions This a server side implementation. The Storage Serialization Policy File (StorageSerializerPolicy.gwt.rpc) is mandatory for server side serialization. This file will be generated by GWT compilation process and placed in folder . In multi module case, multi policy files will be generated separately with the same name (StorageSerializerPolicy.gwt.rpc) But in different module folder. In Server side, before calling StorageUtils#serialize(...), the concerned GWT module's Storage Serialization file should be already loaded by StorageUtils.PolicyLoader. You don't need to call to load the policy file every time before server side serialization. You can do it only one time at your servlet initialization phase. There is a super-src version of this class which will by used for client side. Created by: Xi
